startText.en:
We’re asking everyone to complete a survey every 3 months during the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.

Your information will help us to understand whether your treatment plan is effective and acceptable.

Thank you so much for your important contribution.

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName] for completing your first of 3 baseline surveys for the PLAN-psoriasis trial.

Please now return to the home page and complete the second survey entitled 'Treatment experience'.

protocols.name: sample_blood_instructions_fu6_2.0.0
protocols.label: How to take a blood sample

startText.en:
Hello [firstName]

We're asking everyone to send us a blood sample at 6 months into the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.

The sample will be used to monitor the concentration of biologic drug in your blood.

The following steps explain how to take a blood sample at home.

Please collect and post the sample on a Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday.

Taking a blood sample is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study. Please read the step-by-step guide, and let us know on the final page if you take a sample.

Thank you so much for your valuable contribution and please get in touch if you have questions.

endText.en:
Thank you [firstName]

Please now return to the home page and complete the survey entitled 'Psoriasis'.

title.en: mySkin blood sample

text.en: Please send us your blood sample

title.en: Please send us your blood sample

body.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for your ongoing participation in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.
We're asking everyone to send us a blood sample at 6 months into the study. This will be used to monitor the concentration of biologic drug in your blood.
Please open the mySkin app and follow the step-by-step guide to taking your blood sample at home.

Taking a blood sample is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study. Please read the step-by-step guide in the mySkin app, and let us know on the final page if you take a sample.

Thank you so much for your valuable contribution and please get in touch if you have questions.

The PLAN-psoriasis team
Email: PLAN@kcl.ac.uk

startText.en:
Hello [firstName]

We're asking everyone to take 3 photos of their skin for upload to our secure database.

We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

title.en: mySkin photo form

text.en: Please complete your mySkin photo form

title.en: Please complete your mySkin photo form

body.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for your ongoing participation in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.
We're asking everyone to take 3 photos of their skin for upload to our secure database every 3 months during the study.
We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

If you would like to submit photos, please open the mySkin app and start the photos form. This is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study.

Thank you so much for your valuable contribution.

The PLAN-psoriasis team
Email: PLAN@kcl.ac.uk
